traits.name: @gmlewis/moonbit-pdk/pdk.ToUtf16
traits.docstring:
ToUtf16 is a workaround since the standard library does not make
 it easy to write a standard UTF-16 string from UTF-8.
 https://github.com/moonbitlang/core/issues/484

methods.name: to_utf16
methods.docstring: `to_utf16` converts a UTF-8 encoded `Bytes` to a MoonBit (UTF-16) `String`.

traits.name: @gmlewis/moonbit-pdk/pdk.ToUtf8
traits.docstring:
ToUtf8 is a workaround since the standard library does not make
 it easy to write a standard UTF-8 string.
 https://github.com/moonbitlang/core/issues/484

methods.name: to_utf8
methods.docstring: `to_utf8` converts the MoonBit (UTF-16) `String` to a UTF-8 encoded `Bytes`.
